metadata.title: Aurelia Archipelago: Luminous Horizons

generator.notes: Draft module assembled for regression testing of adventure lifecycle.

metadata.summary: A chain of solar-powered islands threatened by the Shadow Cartel while the legendary Solaryn stirs beneath the waves.

world.setting: A sun-drenched archipelago where floating solar arrays power island habitats and Pokémon research domes.
world.startingContext: Festival preparations in Sunspire City are interrupted by cartel sabotage, leaving the solar grid flickering.
world.tone: Adventurous and cinematic with bright highs and looming shadows.
hooks: A sabotaged solar array strands travelers across the archipelago.
Rival Set challenges the player to race for the Radiant Badge.
Professor Marina requests help retrieving the Solaryn Keystone before the cartel does.
Companion Lyra uncovers evidence that the cartel is funneling energy to an unknown subterranean vault.

loc_sunspire_city.name: Sunspire City
loc_sunspire_city.summary: Capital hub of the archipelago and site of the Radiant Gym.
loc_sunspire_city.fullDescription: Sunspire's terraced plazas glitter with solar glass. Research domes line the harbor while the Radiant Gym towers above, channeling daylight into radiant arenas.

pointsOfInterest.name: Radiant Gym
pointsOfInterest.description: Arena of refracted light overseen by Leader Solaris.

pointsOfInterest.name: Aurelia Research Dome
pointsOfInterest.description: Professor Marina's lab dedicated to sustainable Pokémon habitats.

encounters.trigger: Player challenges Solaris for the Radiant Badge.
encounters.narrative: Solaris tests the challenger's ability to adapt to blinding light and shifting terrain.

outcomes.description: Radiant Badge awarded and solar grid stabilized.

connectedLocations.notes: Glide rail along the festival promenade.

loc_tidal_crown_city.name: Tidal Crown City
loc_tidal_crown_city.summary: An amphitheater city built into coral cliffs, home to the Tidal Crown Gym.
loc_tidal_crown_city.fullDescription: Waterfalls cascade through amphitheater arenas while tide-powered turbines hum beneath the boardwalks.

pointsOfInterest.name: Tidal Crown Gym
pointsOfInterest.description: A multi-tiered water arena regulated by tide gates.

pointsOfInterest.name: Coral Lock Network
pointsOfInterest.description: Controls sea level flow across trade routes.

encounters.trigger: Investigate flickering tide gates during festival night.
encounters.narrative: Shadow Cartel divers sabotage the turbines, releasing caged Sharpedo.

outcomes.description: Cartel plot disrupted, unlocking safe passage to Shattered Reef.

loc_verdant_cradle.name: Verdant Cradle
loc_verdant_cradle.summary: Floating greenhouse arcs supporting the Verdant Cradle Gym.
loc_verdant_cradle.fullDescription: Suspended sky gardens provide nutrient-rich habitats populated by symbiotic Pokémon and botanists.

pointsOfInterest.name: Verdant Sanctuary Gym
pointsOfInterest.description: Aerial platforms rotate to simulate trail puzzles.

pointsOfInterest.name: Seedling Archive
pointsOfInterest.description: Stores rare starter seeds, guarded by Thorn's Trevenant.

encounters.trigger: Assist in rebalancing pollination drones after sabotage.
encounters.narrative: Players coordinate with friendly Combee swarms to restore nutrient flow.

outcomes.description: Unlocks access to Rootbound Labyrinth and yields growth tonics.

loc_slate_bastion.name: Slate Bastion
loc_slate_bastion.summary: Fortified mining town anchored around the Bastion Gym.
loc_slate_bastion.fullDescription: Basalt walls repel constant storms while subterranean forges harness geothermal vents.

pointsOfInterest.name: Bastion Hammer Gym
pointsOfInterest.description: An endurance trial fought atop moving ore carts.

pointsOfInterest.name: Geothermal Forge
pointsOfInterest.description: Shadow Cartel attempts to siphon power from this facility.

encounters.trigger: Respond to a collapsing mine shaft during cartel sabotage.
encounters.narrative: Players free trapped miners while battling magnetized Steelix drones.

outcomes.description: Cartel influence in Slate Bastion diminishes.

loc_zephyr_haven.name: Zephyr Haven
loc_zephyr_haven.summary: Floating wind farms and the Zephyr Haven Gym drift in constant gales.
loc_zephyr_haven.fullDescription: Levitation crystals keep the island suspended while skyfarers cultivate gale-adapted Pokémon.

pointsOfInterest.name: Zephyr Cyclone Gym
pointsOfInterest.description: Rotating arenas demand balance and aerial strategy.

pointsOfInterest.name: Wind Relay Towers
pointsOfInterest.description: Relay stations that stabilize stormfront communications.

encounters.trigger: Navigate a cyclone corridor to rescue downed gliders.
encounters.narrative: Players coordinate updrafts while Aeris's Talonflame herd stray Drifloon.

outcomes.description: Unlocks access to the Skyglass Spire dungeon.

loc_luminous_mirage.name: Luminous Mirage
loc_luminous_mirage.summary: Psychic sanctum and home to Mirage Gym hidden within refracted light mazes.
loc_luminous_mirage.fullDescription: Mirrors and psychic crystals bend perception; visitors rely on guided lights to traverse.

pointsOfInterest.name: Mirage Refraction Gym
pointsOfInterest.description: Teleport pads rearrange the battlefield mid-match.

pointsOfInterest.name: Psychic Observatory
pointsOfInterest.description: Researches Solaryn's dream signals.

encounters.trigger: Solve illusions to reach the Mirage Gym.
encounters.narrative: Mirage guides challengers through echoing futures while testing empathy.

outcomes.description: Unlocks access to the Eclipsed Sanctum and reveals cartel hideouts.

connectedLocations.notes: Light bridge activated after gym trial

loc_emberglow_wastes.name: Emberglow Wastes
loc_emberglow_wastes.summary: Volcanic desert hosting Quake's Ground Gym and hidden ruins.
loc_emberglow_wastes.fullDescription: Glassified dunes shimmer above magma veins; storms of ash reveal ancient technology.

pointsOfInterest.name: Wasteland Resonance Gym
pointsOfInterest.description: Earthquake chambers shift geometry mid-battle.

pointsOfInterest.name: Seismic Beacon Network
pointsOfInterest.description: Tracks Solaryn tremors; cartel seeks to hijack data.

encounters.trigger: Cartel commandos attempt to steal beacon cores.
encounters.narrative: Quake teams with the player against Garchomp riders stirring sandstorms.

outcomes.description: Cartel offensive routed, revealing path to Solaris Forge.

loc_starfall_observatory.name: Starfall Observatory
loc_starfall_observatory.summary: Electromagnetic observatory that doubles as Nova's Electric Gym.
loc_starfall_observatory.fullDescription: An observatory perched on a floating ring, collecting cosmic rays to power experimental labs.

pointsOfInterest.name: Starfall Conductor Gym
pointsOfInterest.description: Battlefield rotates around electromagnetic pylons.

pointsOfInterest.name: Cosmic Array
pointsOfInterest.description: Monitors Solaryn energy surges.

encounters.trigger: Set issues a rematch atop the cosmic array.
encounters.narrative: Set's adaptive strategies force the player to counter agile Rotom formations.

outcomes.description: Rival yields data unlocking the path to Eclipsed Sanctum.

loc_coral_causeway.name: Coral Causeway
loc_coral_causeway.summary: Central transit route lined with stalls and festival games.
loc_coral_causeway.fullDescription: Bioluminescent coral paths weave between islets. Travelers gather at night markets and story plazas.

pointsOfInterest.name: Luminous Stage
pointsOfInterest.description: Hosts performances by traveling companions.

pointsOfInterest.name: Hidden Cargo Hold
pointsOfInterest.description: Smuggling tunnel disguised beneath market stalls.

encounters.trigger: Adventure start during the Luminous Festival.
encounters.narrative: Cartel saboteurs ignite fireworks to mask their theft of Solaryn energy cells.

outcomes.description: Player rescues festival goers and chooses a starter partner.

loc_shattered_reef_vault.name: Shattered Reef Vault
loc_shattered_reef_vault.summary: Submerged vault containing ancient Solaryn technology.
loc_shattered_reef_vault.fullDescription: Labyrinthine coral caverns hide luminous glyphs; water currents conceal traps.

pointsOfInterest.name: Solaryn Glyph Chamber
pointsOfInterest.description: Reveals history of Solaryn and the archipelago.

encounters.trigger: Cartel boss attempts to seize Solaryn Keystone.
encounters.narrative: Shadow Cartel saboteurs deploy quakedozer drones while Set lends reluctant aid.

outcomes.description: Players safeguard Keystone, unlocking legendary quest progression.

loc_luminescent_caverns.name: Luminescent Caverns
loc_luminescent_caverns.summary: Crystal cave network humming with Solaryn resonance.
loc_luminescent_caverns.fullDescription: Bioluminescent crystals sing harmonic tones; explorers coordinate to avoid resonant collapses.

pointsOfInterest.name: Resonance Altar
pointsOfInterest.description: Synchronizes the Solaryn Keystone's pulse.

encounters.trigger: Trace Solaryn songlines to stabilize crystals.
encounters.narrative: Friendly Carbink guide the player through echo puzzles while a stray Diancie tests their harmony.

outcomes.description: Player attunes Keystone, enhancing legendary quest progression.

loc_skyglass_spire.name: Skyglass Spire
loc_skyglass_spire.summary: Aerial dungeon of glass platforms frequented by rare bird Pokémon.
loc_skyglass_spire.fullDescription: Transparent bridges glimmer in the sun; missteps send challengers floating to safe nets patrolled by Aeris's team.

pointsOfInterest.name: Skyglass Nest
pointsOfInterest.description: Roost of the guardian Talonflame.

encounters.trigger: Ride updrafts to deliver emergency supplies to gliders.
encounters.narrative: Cooperative gliding fosters bonds between trainers and Pokémon.

outcomes.description: Player gains trust of aerial community and faster travel between islands.

loc_rootbound_labyrinth.name: Rootbound Labyrinth
loc_rootbound_labyrinth.summary: An overgrown trial ground beneath Verdant Cradle.
loc_rootbound_labyrinth.fullDescription: Massive roots form shifting corridors while glowing spores mark safe passage.

pointsOfInterest.name: Heartwood Shrine
pointsOfInterest.description: Blesses trainers who preserve ecological balance.

encounters.trigger: Face Thorn's Trevenant to earn passage.
encounters.narrative: A symbiotic Trevenant tests environmental stewardship.

outcomes.description: Unlocks subterranean river to Luminescent Caverns.

loc_aurelia_depths.name: Aurelia Depths
loc_aurelia_depths.fullDescription: Luminescent currents swirl around a colossal, dormant figure. Ancient pylons hum with stored sunlight.

pointsOfInterest.name: Solaryn Core
pointsOfInterest.description: The heart of the legendary Pokémon awaiting balance.

encounters.trigger: Complete Keystone attunement and confront the Shadow Cartel.
encounters.narrative: Solaryn awakens amidst a battle between cartel dreadnoughts and league guardians.

outcomes.description: Final quest resolution branches; Solaryn chooses alliance based on player decisions.

loc_gale_ruins.name: Gale Ruins
loc_gale_ruins.summary: Storm-ravaged ruins containing weather control relics.
loc_gale_ruins.fullDescription: Crumbling towers harness wind currents; relics recalibrate the archipelago's climate shield.

pointsOfInterest.name: Tempest Relic
pointsOfInterest.description: Controls emergency weather overrides.

encounters.trigger: Stabilize relics to prevent archipelago-wide storm.
encounters.narrative: Cooperate with Dex to reconfigure weather pylons while fending off rogue Braviary.

outcomes.description: Unlocks all-weather travel routes.

loc_solaris_forge.name: Solaris Forge
loc_solaris_forge.summary: Ancient facility that channels sunlight into defensive barriers.
loc_solaris_forge.fullDescription: Golden conduits run beneath molten glass; dormant constructs guard the forge's core.

pointsOfInterest.name: Forge Core
pointsOfInterest.description: Controls the archipelago's solar barrier.

encounters.trigger: Retake the forge from cartel engineers.
encounters.narrative: Solaris leads a charge alongside the player to reclaim the forge.

outcomes.description: Solar barrier restored, weakening the cartel's influence island-wide.

connectedLocations.notes: Hidden tunnel revealed after retaking forge

loc_eclipsed_sanctum.name: Eclipsed Sanctum
loc_eclipsed_sanctum.summary: Shadow Cartel's mobile headquarters hidden beneath the archipelago.
loc_eclipsed_sanctum.fullDescription: An inverted ziggurat with constant eclipse lighting; cartel lieutenants coordinate operations here.

pointsOfInterest.name: Command Nexus
pointsOfInterest.description: Central tactical room siphoning Solaryn energy.

encounters.trigger: Confront boss Noctis at the height of the cartel uprising.
encounters.narrative: Allies from across the islands rally to breach the sanctum.

outcomes.description: Cartel operations crippled; Solaryn energy redistributed to the people.

loc_starlit_market.name: Starlit Market
loc_starlit_market.summary: Night bazaar that travels between islands.
loc_starlit_market.fullDescription: Floating lanterns and mobile shops provide rare wares and rumors.

pointsOfInterest.name: Lyra's Pop-Up Stage
pointsOfInterest.description: Lyra shares songs that reveal hidden knowledge.

encounters.narrative: Companions and locals exchange tales providing clues for quests.

outcomes.description: Unlocks vector notes for future sessions and deepens companion bonds.

npc_professor_marina.name: Professor Marina Sol
npc_professor_marina.role: Head researcher of the Aurelia Research Dome
npc_professor_marina.motivation: Ensure sustainable coexistence between technology, trainers, and Solaryn's awakening.
npc_professor_marina.fullDescription: Marina is a visionary marine biologist who pioneered solar-harmonic research. She wields calm authority and deep empathy for Pokémon.

relationships.summary: Co-develop solar conduit technology.
Opposes the cartel's exploitation of Solaryn.
Guides Lyra's investigative reporting.

lines.speaker: npc_professor_marina
lines.content: Solaryn's pulse is uneven tonight. I need your help to restore the harmony before the Shadow Cartel exploits it.

lines.speaker: npc_professor_marina
lines.content: Trust Lyra's instincts. Her data leads us to the cartel's next move.

npc_gym_leader_solaris.name: Leader Solaris
npc_gym_leader_solaris.motivation: Protect the archipelago's solar network and inspire challengers to shine.
npc_gym_leader_solaris.fullDescription: Solaris is a former engineer who redesigned Sunspire City's solar arrays into an arena that rewards creative tactics. Their radiance encourages challengers to become beacons for others.

relationships.summary: Collaborates on solar research to stabilize Solaryn.
Solaris foils the cartel's attempts to hijack the solar grid.
Trains Set to temper ambition with responsibility.

lines.speaker: npc_gym_leader_solaris
lines.content: We bend sunlight into a battlefield here. Show me how brightly you can adapt.

lines.speaker: npc_gym_leader_solaris
lines.content: Victory means guiding others out of the dark—not just basking in your own glow.

npc_gym_leader_cascade.name: Leader Cascade
npc_gym_leader_cascade.motivation: Maintain the archipelago's flow of trade and culture through balanced tides.
npc_gym_leader_cascade.fullDescription: Cascade conducts tide-synced performances that double as gym battles. She views each challenger as a current feeding the archipelago's shared ocean.

relationships.summary: Lyra documents Cascade's water dances for investigative broadcasts.
Saboteur disrupts tide locks to destabilize Cascade's city.
Coordinates energy backup in case of power outages.

lines.speaker: npc_gym_leader_cascade
lines.content: Every tide tells a story. Ride the rhythm with me or be swept away.

npc_gym_leader_thorn.name: Leader Thorn
npc_gym_leader_thorn.motivation: Guard the archipelago's living seedbanks and reward caretakers of the ecosystem.
npc_gym_leader_thorn.fullDescription: Thorn is a botanist who communicates with plant-partner Pokémon via pheromone flutes. They judge challengers by their empathy toward living habitats.

relationships.summary: Dex supplies drone data to keep Verdant Cradle habitats safe.
Commander attempts to seize Thorn's nutrient latticework.

lines.speaker: npc_gym_leader_thorn
lines.content: Nurture every move. If your heart strays, the labyrinth will close around you.

npc_gym_leader_onyx.name: Leader Onyx
npc_gym_leader_onyx.motivation: Forged in the mines, Onyx pushes challengers to prove resilience against adversity.
npc_gym_leader_onyx.fullDescription: Onyx leads the archipelago guard's engineering corps. Their stoic demeanor hides a warm respect for anyone who stands up to bullies.

relationships.summary: Noctis targets Onyx's mines to steal molten energy.
Synchronizes seismic sensors with Quake to protect miners.

lines.speaker: npc_gym_leader_onyx
lines.content: Steel yourself. The Bastion only yields to trainers who stand firm when the ground splits.

npc_gym_leader_aeris.name: Leader Aeris
npc_gym_leader_aeris.motivation: Keep the skies open for travelers and ensure no one is left grounded.
npc_gym_leader_aeris.fullDescription: Aeris is a skyfarer who runs aerial rescue drills with her Talonflame squadron. She values creative maneuvers and teamwork in dizzying heights.

relationships.summary: Dex coordinates drone footage for Aeris's rescue drills.
Helps Set master aerial strategies for rematches.

lines.speaker: npc_gym_leader_aeris
lines.content: Keep your balance. Every gust can lift you higher or hurl you below.

npc_gym_leader_mirage.name: Leader Mirage
npc_gym_leader_mirage.motivation: Guide others to see possibilities hidden behind fear and doubt.
npc_gym_leader_mirage.fullDescription: Mirage is a clairvoyant illusionist who uses mirrors to show challengers the consequences of their choices. Compassion guides every riddle.

relationships.summary: Shares psychic readings about Solaryn's dreams.
Uses illusions to expose Noctis's hidden operations.

lines.speaker: npc_gym_leader_mirage
lines.content: What you fear will appear before you. Accept it, and the path clarifies.

npc_gym_leader_quake.name: Leader Quake
npc_gym_leader_quake.motivation: Channel tremors into protective rhythms that keep communities safe.
npc_gym_leader_quake.fullDescription: Quake is a former ranger who reads seismic pulses like a heartbeat. They lead desert caravans to shelter whenever danger roils underground.

relationships.summary: Shares seismic intel to shield miners.
Counters the commander's sand skimmer raids.

lines.speaker: npc_gym_leader_quake
lines.content: Feel the tremor, predict the break, and stand unshaken.

npc_gym_leader_nova.name: Leader Nova
npc_gym_leader_nova.motivation: Harness cosmic energy to empower the archipelago's defenders.
npc_gym_leader_nova.fullDescription: Nova is an astronomer who composes symphonies based on aurora data. Gym battles sync to cosmic rhythms, challenging reflexes and strategy.

relationships.summary: Analyzes Set's battle data to help them grow.
Tracks energy siphoning patterns to predict cartel strikes.

lines.speaker: npc_gym_leader_nova
lines.content: Tune into the cosmic beat. Let your Pokémon resonate with the stars.

npc_rival_set.name: Set Navarro
npc_rival_set.motivation: Prove their inventions can protect the islands better than the league status quo.
npc_rival_set.fullDescription: Set is a quick-thinking inventor who modifies battle gear on the fly. Their pride masks a deep desire to keep their home safe.

relationships.summary: Lyra covers Set's experiments and helps humanize their image.
Solaris pushes Set to consider community impact.
Noctis tries to recruit Set's tech for the cartel.

lines.speaker: npc_rival_set
lines.content: I'm not here to slow you down—I'm here to make sure you're strong enough to protect this place.

npc_shadow_cartel_boss.name: Noctis Vale
npc_shadow_cartel_boss.motivation: Monopolize Solaryn's energy to hold the archipelago hostage.
npc_shadow_cartel_boss.fullDescription: Noctis is a charismatic tactician who grew up in the undercity of Slate Bastion. They harness forbidden tech to siphon solar power for profit.

relationships.summary: Seeks to dismantle Solaris's solar barrier safeguards.
Tempts Set with promises of limitless resources.
Attempts to steal Marina's research to control Solaryn.

lines.speaker: npc_shadow_cartel_boss
lines.content: Light or shadow—it all bends to whoever holds the conduit. Surrender the keystone.

npc_shadow_cartel_saboteur.name: Saboteur Lure
npc_shadow_cartel_saboteur.motivation: Earn Noctis's favor by crippling the archipelago's tide networks.
npc_shadow_cartel_saboteur.fullDescription: Lure is a stealth specialist who plants explosive charges along underwater turbines.

relationships.summary: Targets the tide locks under Cascade's protection.

lines.speaker: npc_shadow_cartel_saboteur
lines.content: Floodgates fail, profits surge. That's how business works in Noctis's world.

npc_shadow_cartel_commander.name: Commander Rasp
npc_shadow_cartel_commander.motivation: Oversee cartel extraction teams and break resistance.
npc_shadow_cartel_commander.fullDescription: Rasp is a militant earthbender who pilots sand skimmers through volcanic storms.

relationships.summary: Leads raids against Quake's seismic beacons.
Attempts to steal ore shipments from Onyx's mines.

lines.speaker: npc_shadow_cartel_commander
lines.content: The cartel doesn't negotiate. We take what the league hoards.

npc_shadow_cartel_scout.name: Scout Nyra
npc_shadow_cartel_scout.motivation: Map festival routes to smuggle energy cells unnoticed.
npc_shadow_cartel_scout.fullDescription: Nyra blends into markets with sleight of hand and disguised cargo drones.

relationships.summary: Lyra exposes Nyra's smuggling routes in her broadcasts.

lines.speaker: npc_shadow_cartel_scout
lines.content: The festival lights make perfect cover—unless a nosy reporter gets in the way.

npc_companion_lyra.name: Lyra Dawn
npc_companion_lyra.motivation: Expose the cartel and uplift communities with truth and music.
npc_companion_lyra.fullDescription: Lyra is a singer-reporter whose performances embed hidden data. She joins the player to gather intel in plain sight.

relationships.summary: Marina supports Lyra's citizen science broadcasts.
Helps Set translate tech jargon for the public.

lines.speaker: npc_companion_lyra
lines.content: I'll sing the truth so everyone hears it—and you make sure we have a story worth telling.

npc_companion_dex.name: Dex Calder
npc_companion_dex.motivation: Use technology to keep travelers safe and document the archipelago's beauty.
npc_companion_dex.fullDescription: Dex pilots camera drones and builds rescue gear. They balance caution with daring stunts.

relationships.summary: Runs aerial rescue drills with Aeris.
Deploys scout drones to monitor Verdant Cradle's climate.

lines.speaker: npc_companion_dex
lines.content: The faster we map the danger, the faster we can get everyone out.

item_sunflare_badge.name: Sunflare Badge
item_sunflare_badge.fullDescription: Badge granted by Solaris that stores excess solar energy in a protective lattice.
item_sunflare_badge.effects: Boosts Fire-type moves and restores a small amount of vigor after sunny weather turns.

placement.notes: Awarded for defeating the Radiant Gym.

item_tidal_coronet.name: Tidal Coronet
item_tidal_coronet.fullDescription: Badge shaped like cresting waves symbolizing mastery over fluid tactics.
item_tidal_coronet.effects: Allows safe passage through tide locks and enhances Water-type accuracy.

item_verdant_emblem.name: Verdant Emblem
item_verdant_emblem.fullDescription: Badge grown from living crystal that reacts to the holder's empathy.
item_verdant_emblem.effects: Reduces stamina cost of healing moves and unlocks access to the Rootbound Labyrinth.

placement.notes: Earned by completing Thorn's pollination trial.

item_bastion_cog.name: Bastion Cog
item_bastion_cog.fullDescription: Badge forged from tempered ore representing perseverance.
item_bastion_cog.effects: Increases resistance to terrain hazards and improves Rock-type damage rolls.

placement.notes: Given after stabilizing the mine rescue.

item_zephyr_wing.name: Zephyr Wing
item_zephyr_wing.fullDescription: Badge forged from lightweight alloys tuned to Zephyr Haven's winds.
item_zephyr_wing.effects: Grants access to aerial travel routes and boosts initiative in windy conditions.

placement.notes: Presented after completing the cyclone rescue.

item_mirage_charm.name: Mirage Charm
item_mirage_charm.fullDescription: Psychic charm that refracts light based on the holder's intent.
item_mirage_charm.effects: Unlocks hidden dialogue options in illusion trials and grants psychic resistance.

placement.notes: Awarded for navigating Mirage's mind trial.

item_quake_plate.name: Quake Plate
item_quake_plate.fullDescription: Badge carved from resonance stone that vibrates with steady rhythm.
item_quake_plate.effects: Allows safe travel through seismic zones and empowers Ground-type moves.

placement.notes: Earned by defending the seismic beacon network.

item_nova_circuit.name: Nova Circuit
item_nova_circuit.fullDescription: Badge containing a micro constellation that stores kinetic charge.
item_nova_circuit.effects: Unlocks the observatory's teleport pads and amplifies Electric-type burst damage.

placement.notes: Granted after syncing with the cosmic array.

item_solaryn_keystone.name: Solaryn Keystone
item_solaryn_keystone.fullDescription: Core fragment required to awaken or soothe Solaryn.
item_solaryn_keystone.effects: Acts as a key for the Aurelia Depths and stabilizes Solaryn's temperament during the finale.

placement.notes: Protected by Marina until the player proves trustworthy.

item_growth_tonic.name: Growth Tonic
item_growth_tonic.fullDescription: Botanical tonic that accelerates recovery for Grass-type Pokémon.
item_growth_tonic.effects: Restores vigor and removes status effects from Grass-type allies.

item_shadow_cipher.name: Shadow Cipher
item_shadow_cipher.fullDescription: Encoded device used by the Shadow Cartel to siphon and reroute solar energy.
item_shadow_cipher.effects: Serves as evidence against the cartel and unlocks encrypted intel caches.

item_luminous_pass.name: Luminous Festival Pass
item_luminous_pass.fullDescription: Badge that grants backstage access to the traveling Starlit Market.
item_luminous_pass.effects: Provides discounts at festival shops and reveals rotating vendor schedules.

placement.notes: Given after helping Lyra broadcast cartel findings.

item_ultra_ball.name: Ultra Ball
item_ultra_ball.fullDescription: Advanced capture device engineered for resilient Pokémon encounters.
item_ultra_ball.effects: Grants advantage on capture checks against Pokémon of level 30 or higher.

item_full_restore.name: Full Restore
item_full_restore.fullDescription: Top-tier restorative spray carried by league officials and veteran trainers.
item_full_restore.effects: Completely restores HP and clears all status conditions for one Pokémon.

item_max_potion.name: Max Potion
item_max_potion.fullDescription: First-response medicine issued to Archipelago Guard squads during crises.
item_max_potion.effects: Fully restores HP but does not remove status effects.

item_hyper_potion.name: Hyper Potion
item_hyper_potion.fullDescription: Concentrated healing brew stocked aboard traveling aid barges.
item_hyper_potion.effects: Restores a large amount of HP to a single Pokémon.

item_poke_ball.name: Poké Ball
item_poke_ball.fullDescription: Standard capture capsule distributed freely during the festival opening.
item_poke_ball.effects: Provides baseline capture odds against low-level Pokémon.

item_potion.name: Potion
item_potion.fullDescription: Basic restorative spray supplied by community clinics across the archipelago.
item_potion.effects: Restores a modest amount of HP to a single Pokémon.

faction_luminance_league.name: Luminance League
faction_luminance_league.ideology: Harness shared light to protect and uplift every islander.
faction_luminance_league.fullDescription: Regional league organization that coordinates gym leaders, researchers, and guardians across the archipelago.

relationships.summary: The cartel undermines the league's mission and endangers citizens.
Partners with traveling companions to distribute relief supplies.

faction_shadow_cartel.name: Shadow Cartel
faction_shadow_cartel.ideology: Control Solaryn's energy to secure power and wealth for a select few.
faction_shadow_cartel.fullDescription: Crime syndicate operating smuggling rings, mercenary units, and energy theft operations throughout Aurelia.

relationships.summary: Constantly attempts to sabotage league infrastructure.
Steals research data to reverse engineer Solaryn tech.

faction_archipelago_guard.name: Archipelago Guard
faction_archipelago_guard.ideology: Community-led defense rooted in resilience and preparedness.
faction_archipelago_guard.fullDescription: Volunteer defenders who patrol mines, deserts, and seaways to keep residents safe.

relationships.summary: The cartel raids guard-controlled supply lines.
Companions relay intel and rally public support for the guard.

faction_research_coalition.name: Research Coalition
faction_research_coalition.ideology: Advance sustainable innovations that honor Pokémon ecosystems.
faction_research_coalition.fullDescription: Consortium of scientists, engineers, and psychic scholars who monitor Solaryn activity.

relationships.summary: Provides the league with research insights and tools.
Cartel spies seek to weaponize coalition discoveries.

faction_companion_network.name: Companion Network
faction_companion_network.ideology: Travel together, share stories, and make sure no island faces danger alone.
faction_companion_network.fullDescription: Loose alliance of performers, engineers, and guides who assist trainers and spread information quickly.

relationships.summary: Helps the league distribute resources and morale.
Cartel attempts to bribe or threaten network members.

lore_solaryn_legend.title: The Solaryn Convergence
lore_solaryn_legend.fullText: Solaryn emerged when sunlight woven by ancestral guardians fused with the tides to defend Aurelia from cataclysmic storms. The keystone maintains equilibrium between light and sea.

lore_shadow_cartel_history.title: Rise of the Shadow Cartel
lore_shadow_cartel_history.fullText: After mining conglomerates abandoned the undercity, Noctis united smugglers under a promise of energy equality but twisted it into a stranglehold on vital resources.

lore_archipelago_customs.title: Luminous Festival Traditions
lore_archipelago_customs.fullText: Every equinox the islands exchange lanterns infused with recorded memories to celebrate communal light. Companions carry these lanterns along the Coral Causeway.

lore_guardian_oaths.title: Oaths of the Archipelago Guard
lore_guardian_oaths.fullText: Guard initiates swear to respond to any alarm within three minutes, regardless of origin, prioritizing evacuation before confrontation.

lore_companion_ballads.title: Ballads of the Companion Network
lore_companion_ballads.fullText: Lyra's songs encode coordinates and passphrases to guide refugees between safe houses while lifting spirits.

event_shadow_ambush.name: Shadow Cartel Festival Ambush
triggerConditions: Game start during the Luminous Festival

scenes.description: Lyra spots tampered fireworks as the Coral Causeway erupts in smoke.

lines.speaker: npc_companion_lyra
lines.content: Those aren't festival charges—get people clear while I jam their signal!

lines.speaker: npc_shadow_cartel_scout
lines.content: Too late. The keystone batteries belong to the cartel now!

outcomes.description: Cartel plan exposed, player chooses a starter partner to repel the ambush.

scenes.description: Set admits pressure from Noctis and requests backup to expose the cartel's offer.

lines.speaker: npc_rival_set
lines.content: He promised me funding to power every island. I almost believed him—until I saw the cost.

outcomes.description: Set provides encrypted coordinates to the Eclipsed Sanctum.

scenes.description: Gym leaders and companions form a circle in the Aurelia Depths to harmonize with Solaryn.

lines.speaker: npc_professor_marina
lines.content: Let the archipelago sing as one. Solaryn, hear us and choose partnership over fear.

outcomes.description: Final alignment grants access to Solaryn's blessing or battle, depending on player choices.

quest_pokemon_league.name: Aurelia League Circuit
quest_pokemon_league.summary: Challenge all eight gyms, stabilize the solar network, and earn the right to face the Elite Wave.

stages.objective: Assist Sunspire City during the festival crisis and earn the Sunflare Badge.
stages.description: Investigate the Coral Causeway sabotage, then defeat Leader Solaris.

stages.objective: Earn the next four badges and repair damaged infrastructure.
stages.description: Complete gym trials in Tidal Crown, Verdant Cradle, Slate Bastion, and Zephyr Haven while stopping cartel interference.

stages.objective: Collect the final badges and unlock the Elite Wave gauntlet.
stages.description: Face Mirage, Quake, and Nova while foiling the cartel's final gambits.

stages.objective: Face the Elite Wave atop a sea-swept coliseum.
stages.description: Culminating series of battles once the cartel threat subsides.

quest_rival_arc.name: Set's Redemption
quest_rival_arc.summary: Help Set resist the cartel's influence and realize their innovations can serve everyone.

stages.objective: Compete with Set during the opening crisis.
stages.description: Race Set to secure the Solaryn Keystone fragments and defuse sabotage.
Gather audio logs with Lyra and confront Set about Noctis's promises.

stages.objective: Aid Set in sabotaging the Eclipsed Sanctum's energy siphon.
stages.description: Plan a joint strike using Set's inventions to disable the cartel's mainframe.
rewards: Set becomes an ally in finale

quest_shadow_cartel.name: Shadow Cartel Uprising
quest_shadow_cartel.summary: Expose and dismantle the cartel's operations before they seize Solaryn.

stages.objective: Identify cartel operatives at the festival.
stages.description: Track shipments and intercept encoded messages during the opening ambush.

stages.objective: Sabotage cartel energy siphons across multiple islands.
stages.description: Coordinate with gym leaders to shut down siphon devices and rescue hostages.

stages.objective: Infiltrate the Eclipsed Sanctum and gather evidence against Noctis.
stages.description: Sneak through the cartel's headquarters with Lyra and Set to broadcast their crimes.

stages.objective: Lead the final assault on Noctis and liberate the stolen energy.
stages.description: Rally every ally for the climactic battle beneath the archipelago.

quest_solaryn_mystery.name: Resonance of Solaryn
quest_solaryn_mystery.summary: Study the legendary Solaryn and decide how its power will shape Aurelia's future.

stages.description: Explore Shattered Reef and decode messages with Professor Marina.

stages.objective: Protect the Keystone from cartel theft.
stages.description: Defend the vault alongside Set and Marina.

stages.objective: Attune the Keystone within Luminescent Caverns.
stages.description: Solve resonance puzzles while harmonizing with Carbink fragments.

stages.objective: Decide Solaryn's fate during the resonance ceremony.
stages.description: Choose to ally with, calm, or challenge Solaryn, determining the archipelago's future energy policy.

quest_travel_companions.name: Hearts Across the Archipelago
quest_travel_companions.summary: Support Lyra and Dex as they rally islanders against the cartel.

stages.objective: Help Lyra broadcast truth from the Coral Causeway.
stages.description: Collect testimonies while assisting festival evacuees.

stages.objective: Escort Dex on an aerial relief mission.
stages.description: Deliver supplies to Zephyr Haven and record stormfront data in the Gale Ruins.

stages.objective: Host a Starlit Market story circle to rally allies.
stages.description: Share findings with citizens, inspiring them to join the finale battle.

entries.description: Garchomp scouting mission offering escort opportunities.
Cartel raiding party attempting to steal beacon cores.
Cartel infiltrators attempt to steal glyph shards.

weatherProfiles.description: Mild trade winds carrying luminous spores across the islands.
Cyclonic fronts triggered by cartel interference.

travelRules.description: Access wind elevators and sky ferries across Zephyr Haven once the Zephyr Wing badge is earned.
Stabilize Gale Ruins relics to travel safely during stormfront weather.

scenarioScripts.title: Festival Aftermath
goals: Stabilize the Coral Causeway and reassure citizens
Identify Shadow Cartel operatives at the festival
Prepare to challenge the Radiant Gym
scenarioScripts.summary: The player rallies Lyra and local guardians to contain the cartel's opening strike and set up the Radiant Gym showdown.

scenarioScripts.title: Cartel Countermeasures
goals: Disrupt cartel siphons across the industrial islands
Recruit Set and Dex for coordinated assaults
Unlock access to the Eclipsed Sanctum
scenarioScripts.summary: Allies coordinate simultaneous strikes on cartel outposts in Slate Bastion, Emberglow Wastes, and Solaris Forge.

scenarioScripts.title: Solaryn's Choice
goals: Escort the coalition to the Aurelia Depths
Decide Solaryn's role in the archipelago
scenarioScripts.summary: Gym leaders and companions assemble for the resonance ritual while the player negotiates Solaryn's future and defeats Noctis' last gambit.

inst_magmar_radiant_guard.notes: Assigned to the Radiant Gym's defensive rotation.
inst_magmar_radiant_guard.fullDescription: A veteran Magmar assigned to Solaris's defense team, accustomed to regulating forge temperatures.

inst_milotic_tidal_guardian.fullDescription: Cascade's Milotic wards the tide locks and soothes panicked sailors caught in storm surges.

inst_trevenant_heartwood.notes: Guards the Seedling Archive and tests challengers' empathy.
inst_trevenant_heartwood.fullDescription: A Trevenant that shepherds Verdant Cradle's seedbanks and judges challengers on ecological stewardship.

inst_garchomp_resonance.notes: Guides caravans across sandstorms on Quake's command.
inst_garchomp_resonance.fullDescription: Quake's Garchomp wears resonance harnesses to carve safe paths through Emberglow sandstorms.

inst_shadow_lurantis_cell.notes: Operates beneath the festival stalls during cartel raids.
inst_shadow_lurantis_cell.fullDescription: A Shadow Cartel Lurantis wielding stolen prism tech to cloak raids along the Coral Causeway.

inst_solaryn_radiant_core.notes: Dormant guardian awaiting the resonance ceremony.
inst_solaryn_radiant_core.fullDescription: Solaryn lies dormant in the Aurelia Depths, awaiting a guide who can balance sunlight and tide.

creature_magmar.behaviorNotes: Flare brighter when solar conduits spike, keeping furnace temperatures stable.
evolutionConditions: Evolves to Magmortar when traded holding a Magmarizer
creature_magmar.description: Magmar trained to regulate Aurelia's solar furnaces and forgeworks, thriving amid intense heat.

creature_milotic.behaviorNotes: Hums calming melodies that smooth turbulent tides and reassure sailors.
evolutionConditions: Evolves from Feebas with high beauty or holding a Prism Scale
creature_milotic.description: Milotic native to Aurelia's tide locks, renowned for calming storms and guiding ocean traffic.

creature_trevenant.behaviorNotes: Communicates through spore patterns that recount the grove's ecological memory.
creature_trevenant.description: Trevenant that steward Verdant Cradle's seedbanks and judge visitors' respect for living habitats.

creature_aggron.behaviorNotes: Patrols reinforced tunnels and absorbs stray seismic vibrations.
creature_aggron.description: Aggron that patrol Slate Bastion's basalt tunnels, reinforcing mining routes against collapse.

creature_talonflame.behaviorNotes: Paints spark trails in the air to signal safe glide paths.
creature_talonflame.description: Talonflame accustomed to Zephyr Haven's gale corridors, serving as swift aerial rescue escorts.

creature_gardevoir.behaviorNotes: Projects tranquil future echoes to help challengers center themselves.
creature_gardevoir.description: Gardevoir partnered with Mirage to project tranquil visions and mentor challengers through reflective trials.

creature_garchomp.behaviorNotes: Uses resonance harnesses to sense and pre-empt shifting dunes.
creature_garchomp.description: Garchomp adapted to Emberglow Wastes, carving resonant pathways through volatile sandstorms.

creature_magnezone.behaviorNotes: Orbits charged pylons to modulate auroral energy bursts.
evolutionConditions: Evolves from Magneton when leveled in a strong magnetic field
creature_magnezone.description: Magnezone attuned to Starfall Observatory's cosmic arrays, amplifying charged auroral currents.

creature_shadow_lurantis.behaviorNotes: Employs refracted light patterns to fade in and out of sight.
evolutionConditions: Variant enhancements supplied by the Shadow Cartel
creature_shadow_lurantis.description: Lurantis equipped with illicit prism tech, used by the Shadow Cartel for covert operations.

creature_solaryn_fragment.behaviorNotes: Vibrates in harmony with keystone pulses to guide respectful explorers.
creature_solaryn_fragment.description: Carbink fragments suffused with Solaryn's hymn, guiding respectful explorers through luminescent caverns.

creature_legend_solaryn.behaviorNotes: Illuminates the depths with radiant tides when harmony and resolve align.
creature_legend_solaryn.description: Solaryn, the radiant convergence of sunlight and tide that safeguards the archipelago's equilibrium.

ability_flame_body.name: Flame Body
ability_flame_body.description: The Pokémon radiates intense heat; contact attackers risk burning while nearby forgework stays ignited.

ability_marvel_scale.name: Marvel Scale
ability_marvel_scale.description: Defensive scales shimmer under pressure, raising resilience whenever the Pokémon is impaired.

ability_harvest.name: Harvest
ability_harvest.description: Reclaims restorative resources during calm weather, allowing repeated use of nourishment items.

ability_sturdy.name: Sturdy
ability_sturdy.description: Immovable plating lets the Pokémon withstand otherwise overwhelming blows from full health.

ability_gale_wings.name: Gale Wings
ability_gale_wings.description: Harnesses tailwinds to act first whenever launching Flying-type tactics.

ability_trace.name: Trace
ability_trace.description: Copies an opponent’s battlefield ability for a short duration when entering the fray.

ability_sand_veil.name: Sand Veil
ability_sand_veil.description: Shrouds the Pokémon in sandstorms, heightening evasiveness amid harsh grit.

ability_magnet_pull.name: Magnet Pull
ability_magnet_pull.description: Generates electromagnetic locks that prevent Steel-type foes from retreating.

ability_prism_cloak.name: Prism Cloak
ability_prism_cloak.description: Diffuses light through stolen prism tech, intermittently rendering the user translucent.

ability_resonance_pulse.name: Resonance Pulse
ability_resonance_pulse.description: Vibrates with Solaryn’s hymn, projecting harmonic shields when allies coordinate.

ability_radiant_harmony.name: Radiant Harmony
ability_radiant_harmony.description: Balances sunlight and tides, amplifying allies when battle conditions are stabilized.

ability_signal_beacon.name: Signal Beacon
ability_signal_beacon.description: Project a flare of coherent light that boosts allies’ perception in exploration scenes.
ability_signal_beacon.effects: Allies gain advantage on navigation and awareness checks for the next scene.

ability_rescue_coordination.name: Rescue Coordination
ability_rescue_coordination.description: Directs allied actions with pinpoint timing during evacuations or rapid response.
ability_rescue_coordination.effects: When orchestrating rescues, allies may reroll a failed skill check once per scene.

ability_solar_insight.name: Solar Insight
ability_solar_insight.description: Reads subtle shifts in solar arrays to anticipate environmental hazards.
ability_solar_insight.effects: Gain early warning of ambient threats; party may reposition before hazards trigger.

ability_tidal_guardian.name: Tidal Guardian
ability_tidal_guardian.description: Summons gentle currents that steady allies against oncoming force.
ability_tidal_guardian.effects: Allies gain temporary vigor equal to the channeler’s Wisdom modifier.

ability_currents_embrace.name: Current's Embrace
ability_currents_embrace.description: Wraps the party in restorative tides that purge minor afflictions.
ability_currents_embrace.effects: Once per rest, remove a status effect from each ally in range.

ability_oceanic_resolve.name: Oceanic Resolve
ability_oceanic_resolve.description: Draws strength from deep ocean pressure to resist overwhelming odds.
ability_oceanic_resolve.effects: Allies within 30 feet gain resistance to damage from large foes for one round.

ability_wind_reader.name: Wind Reader
ability_wind_reader.description: Senses microcurrents to predict enemy movement and optimize positioning.
ability_wind_reader.effects: Gain a bonus to initiative checks and ignore difficult aerial terrain.

ability_tempest_drive.name: Tempest Drive
ability_tempest_drive.description: Harnesses storm force to propel sudden strikes without losing balance.
ability_tempest_drive.effects: Once per encounter, make an additional movement and attack after using a Flying-type move.

ability_eye_of_the_storm.name: Eye of the Storm
ability_eye_of_the_storm.description: Establishes a calm center that shields allies amidst chaotic weather.
ability_eye_of_the_storm.effects: Allies within the eye gain advantage on saving throws against environmental hazards.

move_acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
move_acrobatics.description: Executes agile aerial maneuvers that strike harder if the user is unburdened.

move_aegis_of_dawn.name: Aegis of Dawn
move_aegis_of_dawn.description: Erects a shimmering barrier that halves incoming damage for one round.

move_ancient_power.name: Ancient Power
move_ancient_power.description: Launches ancient stones that may raise all stats.

move_aqua_ring.name: Aqua Ring
move_aqua_ring.description: Surrounds the user with healing water that restores vigor each round.

move_aqua_tail.name: Aqua Tail
move_aqua_tail.description: A sweeping tail attack infused with surging water.

move_astonish.name: Astonish
move_astonish.description: A startling strike that can briefly flinch the target.

move_brave_bird.name: Brave Bird
move_brave_bird.description: A reckless dive that hits hard but harms the user from recoil.

move_calm_mind.name: Calm Mind
move_calm_mind.description: Centers the user, raising mental offense and defense.

move_confusion.name: Confusion
move_confusion.description: Emits telekinetic waves that may befuddle the opponent.

move_dragon_claw.name: Dragon Claw
move_dragon_claw.description: Slashes the foe with draconic claws.

move_earthquake.name: Earthquake
move_earthquake.description: A massive tremor that strikes all adjacent combatants.

move_ember.name: Ember
move_ember.description: A small flame projectile that may ignite the target.

move_fire_punch.name: Fire Punch
move_fire_punch.description: A flaming fist strike that delivers searing damage.

move_flame_burst.name: Flame Burst
move_flame_burst.description: A gout of fire that erupts and scorches nearby foes.

move_flame_charge.name: Flame Charge
move_flame_charge.description: Engulfs the user in flames, boosting speed after impact.

move_flame_wheel.name: Flame Wheel
move_flame_wheel.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges, potentially burning the opponent.

move_flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
move_flamethrower.description: A sustained jet of intense flames that may leave burns.

move_flare_blitz.name: Flare Blitz
move_flare_blitz.description: A blazing tackle that deals recoil to the user.

move_flash_cannon.name: Flash Cannon
move_flash_cannon.description: Fires condensed light that can erode defenses.

move_forest_s_curse.name: Forest's Curse
move_forest_s_curse.description: Enshrouds the target, granting it the Grass type in addition to its own.

move_guard_split.name: Guard Split
move_guard_split.description: Balances defensive stats between the user and target.

move_heavy_slam.name: Heavy Slam
move_heavy_slam.description: A crushing body slam whose power scales with the user's weight.

move_horn_leech.name: Horn Leech
move_horn_leech.description: A draining charge that restores the user with stolen energy.

move_hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
move_hypnosis.description: A soothing gaze that can lull a target into sleep.

move_ice_beam.name: Ice Beam
move_ice_beam.description: A freezing beam that may immobilize the target in ice.

move_iron_defense.name: Iron Defense
move_iron_defense.description: A technique awaiting detailed mechanical notes.

move_iron_tail.name: Iron Tail
move_iron_tail.description: A hardened tail strike that can erode defenses.

move_leaf_blade.name: Leaf Blade
move_leaf_blade.description: Strikes with a sharp leafy blade, boasting high critical chance.

move_leech_seed.name: Leech Seed
move_leech_seed.description: Plants parasitic seeds that siphon vigor each turn.

move_light_screen.name: Light Screen
move_light_screen.description: Raises a barrier that softens incoming special damage for allies.

move_luminous_tide.name: Luminous Tide
move_luminous_tide.description: Floods the field in radiant water, cleansing allies of ailments.

move_magnet_rise.name: Magnet Rise
move_magnet_rise.description: Manipulates magnetism to levitate and avoid ground attacks.

move_moonblast.name: Moonblast
move_moonblast.description: Harnesses moonlight to strike and potentially sap special attack.

move_night_slash.name: Night Slash
move_night_slash.description: A swift dark strike with elevated critical odds.

move_peck.name: Peck
move_peck.description: A quick jab with the beak.

move_phantom_force.name: Phantom Force
move_phantom_force.description: A technique awaiting detailed mechanical notes.

move_photon_burst.name: Photon Burst
move_photon_burst.description: Fires condensed photons in a piercing beam of light.

move_poison_jab.name: Poison Jab
move_poison_jab.description: A poisoned jab that may badly poison the target.

move_power_gem.name: Power Gem
move_power_gem.description: Fires glittering rays that strike with precise force.

move_psychic.name: Psychic
move_psychic.description: A mental assault that may reduce the target's resolve.

move_radiant_pulse.name: Radiant Pulse
move_radiant_pulse.description: Emits a wave of balanced light that revitalizes allies slightly.

move_recover.name: Recover
move_recover.description: Harnesses internal energy to restore lost vigor.

move_reflect.name: Reflect
move_reflect.description: Creates a barrier that reduces physical damage for allies.

move_sand_attack.name: Sand Attack
move_sand_attack.description: Flings sand to obscure the target's vision, lowering accuracy.

move_sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
move_sandstorm.description: Summons a sandstorm that chips away at non-grounded foes.

move_scorching_sands.name: Scorching Sands
move_scorching_sands.description: Superheated sandstorm that may sear foes while striking from afar.

move_shadow_claw.name: Shadow Claw
move_shadow_claw.description: A chilling slash that strikes with high critical force.

move_solar_blade.name: Solar Blade
move_solar_blade.description: Charges on the first turn, unleashes a sweeping slash of sunlight.

move_solar_requiem.name: Solar Requiem
move_solar_requiem.description: Channels solar tides to strike all foes with overwhelming radiance.

move_spark.name: Spark
move_spark.description: An electrified tackle that may paralyze the target.

move_stone_edge.name: Stone Edge
move_stone_edge.description: Razor-edged stones erupt dealing heavy critical damage.

move_sunny_day.name: Sunny Day
move_sunny_day.description: Floods the field with harsh sunlight, empowering Fire techniques and weakening Water.

move_surf.name: Surf
move_surf.description: A powerful tidal wave that strikes all nearby foes.

move_tackle.name: Tackle
move_tackle.description: A technique awaiting detailed mechanical notes.

move_tailwind.name: Tailwind
move_tailwind.description: Summons a supportive gale that doubles the team's speed briefly.

move_thunder.name: Thunder
move_thunder.description: A booming thunderbolt with massive power but erratic accuracy.

move_thunder_shock.name: Thunder Shock
move_thunder_shock.description: A jolt of electricity that may paralyze.

move_water_pulse.name: Water Pulse
move_water_pulse.description: A pulsing wave that can leave foes disoriented.

move_x_scissor.name: X-Scissor
move_x_scissor.description: Crosses bladelike limbs to cleave the foe.

class_solar_scout.name: Solar Scout
class_solar_scout.description: Light-guiding navigators who chart safe routes and rally evac teams across the archipelago.

class_tide_channeler.name: Tide Channeler
class_tide_channeler.description: Mystics who weave restorative tides and shield crews from the Shadow Cartel's sabotage.

class_storm_rider.name: Storm Rider
class_storm_rider.description: Aerial tacticians who master wind lanes and strike with precision during volatile weather.

class_ember_guardian.name: Ember Guardian
class_ember_guardian.description: Shield-bearing frontliners who stabilize geothermal forges and hold the line against cartel incursions.

class_horizon_vanguard.name: Horizon Vanguard
class_horizon_vanguard.description: Radiant trailblazers who balance solar arrays and inspire allies with luminous tactics.

GymLeader.name: Gym Leader
GymLeader.description: Battle-tested leaders who channel regional themes into signature encounters.

Innovator.name: Innovator
Innovator.description: Inventive tacticians who prototype battlefield technology on the fly.

CrimeLord.name: Crime Lord
CrimeLord.description: Cartel masterminds who leverage intimidation and illicit tech.

Saboteur.name: Saboteur
Saboteur.description: Stealth agents adept at disabling infrastructure and retreating unseen.

Commander.name: Cartel Commander
Commander.description: Field leaders who direct mercenary squads during assaults.

Scout.name: Cartel Scout
Scout.description: Recon specialists who map routes and relay intel for cartel operations.

Researcher.name: Researcher
Researcher.description: Scholars who document Solaryn phenomena and coordinate field studies.

Bard.name: Festival Bard
Bard.description: Performers who inspire allies and spread encoded messages through song.

Technician.name: Technician
Technician.description: Engineers who tune gear mid-battle and stabilize experimental devices.
